messages.message: FRB wants to extract the employee name and employer name using the w2 flow we delivered. The formula they’re trying to use in Refiner is `Clean(scan_below(INPUT_COL, 'Employee name', num_lines = 1 , e=2, right_pad = 30))`. I’ve told them that they don’t need to set e that high unless they’re seeing enough inaccuracies in OCR to warrant it. Beyond that, does this seem like an adequate refiner formula to do what they want?
Not sure the right_pad is needed either, but really mostly curious about doing scan_below with num_lines=1. Seems like that would do what they want.
Unrelated to this item, they are also reporting odd behavior trying to move files between two directories in the web interface:
> No error message when trying to move files. The spinning dots just keep on a spinnin’. No system response. Infinite loop.
> We see another anomaly when we try to copy files from one ib directory to another.  Parisa found a work-around by dragging-dropping to and from the desktop.
